page.title: 16Clubs in Kensworth
page.content: In Kensworth there is a thriving over 60 Club formed in 1972 meeting once a fortnight in the Village Hall for a general get together,Bingo,Dominoes. Every year 4 or 5 outings to Seaside, Theatre,Mystery,Shopping are funded by members & friends contributions,Jumble Sales,Bazaars etc.Membership 60. Slimming World Club is held every Wednesday in the Village Hall at 7.30pm,there are between 10-18 members.Each member is weighed and given individual attention.Then the group has discussions in a friendly atmosphere. As a result of the interest shown in a display of old & new photographs prepared for Kensworth Carnival '85 held in June a study group has been formed to collate & record the history of Kensworth. There is also a W.I.meeting monthly.
